responses: You're welcome. Thank you for visiting our website.
No problem! Have a great day :)
We sell Baseball Gear and baseball related items.
We sell baseball gear! Alongside with baseball related items, our store is perfect for you.
Shipping times are roughly 2 weeks. You can expect a confirmation email with details about your order when you order.
Glad you asked. Shipping times are roughly 2 weeks from when you place your order. Your email will have a confirmation with details about your order. It might arrive earlier than expected ;)
It takes 2 weeks to ship, check your email for further details. If it takes longer, then its not our problem.
Hi there! We accept all forms of credit cards. If your credit card is not on there, contact us and we can help sort things out!
We accept all credit cards. It's literally on the FAQ's.
Yes Refunds are accepted within 30 days of purchase for an unopened, undamaged item.
Refunds are accepted within 30 days usually of a purchase for an unopened, and undamaged item. However if you did open it or anything, we'll see what we can do, no worries!
Refunds are accepted within 30 days of purchase. Read the FAQ's.
